entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Meadow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -34.9°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
